attributes.additional_details: Because it is cruel and unfair to the animals and is bad for the environment. PBS states that 40% of methane emissions come from farms
attributes.background: I think that raising and slaughtering of animals in the UK should be stopped, because it is cruel and unfair to the animals

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petition open which you might like to sign:

The Vegan Petition - Ban Animal Slaughter and Animal Products by 2030
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637792
